name: Infested Zone
description:
Top-down shooter. Complete 5 levels to win.

Controls

Movement: WASD or arrow keys
Looking around: Mouse
Shooting: LMB and RMB
Tutorial included, no pad support at the moment.

Developer's comments

Originally an Alakajam 1 entry

Developer commentary

No WebGL build yet, as it does not support the Tilemap or the AudioMixer well at all.
